method.name: get_stationary_reference_space_uuid
method.description: Returns a [code]StringName[/code] UUID referencing the active stationary reference space.

method.name: is_stationary_reference_space_available
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if stationary reference space is available for use.

method.name: set_stationary_reference_space_enabled
method.description: Sets the stationary reference space as enabled or disabled. Note: The Stationary Reference Space project setting must be enabled in order to enable the reference space.
